name: tentree Bamone Joggers - Women's
description:
Treat your hard-working legs to a healthy dose of cozy. These are soft and comfortable, just how sweatpants should be.Made from organically grown cotton and recycled polyester.Ribbed waist.Cuffed ankles.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.
